Citation.sTitle: Calorimetric investigation of the La2Zr2O7, Nd2Zr2O7, Sm2Zr2O7 and LaYO3 compounds and CALPHAD assessment of the La2O3-Y2O3 system
Citation.sAbstract: Temperature dependence of heat capacity of the La2Zr2O7, Nd2Zr2O7, Sm2Zr2O7 and LaYO3 are measured in the temperature range of 298.15-1373 K by differential scanning calorimetry (DSC) and micro-calorimetry. The enthalpy of formation from oxides of LaYO3 was measured by hightemperature lead borate solution calorimery. Transformations in the LaYO3 were experimentally studied using DTA. The obtained results for heat capacity and enthalpy of formation of LaYO3 and temperatures of transformations were used to re-optimize thermodynamic parameters of the La2O3- Y2O3 system.

Property.ePresentation: Difference between upper and lower temperature, X(T2)-X(T1)
